mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_user (userid, orgcode, username, userloginname, password, department, mobilephone, email, merchantcode, paypassword,paySalt, status, isadmin, creator, createtime, modifier, modifytime) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userloginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{paySalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime})
mapper.select:
SELECT u.tfsuserid, u.userid, u.orgcode, u.username, u.userloginname, u.`password`, u.department, u.mobilephone, u.email, u.merchantcode, u.paypassword, u.paysalt, u.status, u.isadmin, u.isoperator, u.creator, u.createtime, b.fcuserid, b.username, b.loginname, b.fcusername, b.fcloginname, b.merchantcode bmerchant, b.isactive, ru.roleid, r.rolecode, r.rolename, r.roleremark, r.fcroleid, ru.isactive roleactive FROM t_tfs_user u LEFT JOIN t_tfs_userbindinfo b ON u.tfsuserid = b.tfsuserid LEFT JOIN t_tfs_user_role ru ON u.tfsuserid = ru.tfsuserid LEFT JOIN t_tfs_role r ON ru.roleid = r.roleid
u.tfsuserid in
#{item}
order by u.createtime
mapper.update:
update t_tfs_user
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgcode = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userloginname = #{userloginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchantcode = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paypassword = #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paysalt = #{paySalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isadmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifytime = #{modifytime},
where tfsuserid = #{tfsuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
